Hi my name is Adham Ahmed 
 I am 20 years old 
 I am currently studying software engineering and will graduate next year. 
 After graduation I would love to work for a huge company like Google to gain experience, serve clients and eventually start my own startup. 
 Due to my field of study, I have a good coding experience. I believe this will make me able to make a helpful impact in any company i join. 
 Please let me know if you have any questions. You can reach me by email adhamahmad541@gmail.com or 20196091@stud.fci-cu.edu.eg
